name: Teen Daal Tadka (3 lentil curry)
description: Teen Daal Tadka (2 Lentil Curry). A quick lentil curry, serve hot topped with fresh cilantro, garam masala, lime juice and serve with fresh dinner rolls!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup split yellow mung daal ((split and skinless green gram/green mung bean))
1/2 cup split toor daal ((split and skinless pigeon pea))
1/2 teaspoon red chili flakes or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the lentils in warm water for an hour to overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the lentils in warm water for an hour to overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat the oil on medium heat until its nice an hot.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, heat the oil on medium heat until its nice an hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add nigella(Kalonji) seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add nigella(Kalonji) seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the red chili flakes and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the red chili flakes and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in tomatoes and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in tomatoes and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the soaked daal and add it to the pan with the water, salt and turmeric.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse the soaked daal and add it to the pan with the water, salt and turmeric.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well. Cook covered for 15-20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well. Cook covered for 15-20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot garnished with cilantro and lime wedges !. Serve with basmati rice or as a side dish with Roti, pickles, one or two vegetable stir fry dishes and a salad of onions and cucumbers tossed in lemon juice, salt and black pepper!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot garnished with cilantro and lime wedges !. Serve with basmati rice or as a side dish with Roti, pickles, one or two vegetable stir fry dishes and a salad of onions and cucumbers tossed in lemon juice, salt and black pepper!

keywords: lentil curry, quick curry recipe, traditional Indian meal
